function_description: Adding a card to a list
initial_state: The user is on a board page with at least one list already created and displayed.
steps: Locate the list to which you want to add a card.
Click on the three dots in the top-right corner of the list to open the options menu.
Select the 'Add Card' option from the menu.
Enter the details for the new card in the provided fields.
Confirm the creation of the card.
expected_state: A new card is added to the bottom of the specified list. The card counter for the list increments by one.
